title: 5.3 Master Challenge 2
question: Create an Excel worksheet that generates random data for 50 different stocks and plots Sparklines for each stock. The Excel should include the stock name and prices for twelve months. Prices should vary between 50 and 150. Plot the data prepared using Sparklines.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
